original_title: Super แหบ แสบ-สะบัด
overview: In among of the Korean trend, the record label, Ngek sends a young Thai-Korean artist mixed with Japanese-German. Tong Lee Hye, a singer who is perfectly perfect. both handsome face plus a wonderful voice. Just the first single was number one in every station. exploded all over the country. But behind Tong Lee Hye hides a secret. Ngek conjures up the creation of Tong Lee Hye from two young men.
title: Superstars
